name: The Gingerbread Dungeon
description:
Description

The Gingerbread Dungeon is a rogue-like dungeon crawler that has you facing only one direction, forward. You will meet very sweet enemies in this dungeon, and you must destroy all of them.

This game was made for MiniJam 66, the theme being Sweets and the limitation only having two buttons you can push.

Controls

In the game, press 'W' to move forward and left mouse button to attack.

That's it.

Credits

2D Art - SlitheryRelic #5176
Music - Kızılejderha #9155
3D Art - mushroom sauce #1940
Programming - ItsmeMaxim #8698
